text: PTX Summer Tour 2018 was the seventh concert tour by American a cappella group Pentatonix to promote their sixth studio album, PTX Presents: Top Pop, Vol. I. The tour began on July 12, 2018 in West Valley City, and concluded on September 16, 2018 in Tinley Park. ==Background and development== On February 27, 2018, the group announced their new album, PTX Presents: Top Pop, Vol. I, along with a 39-city tour. ==Set list== This set list is from the concert on July 12, 2018 in West Valley City.
